polished_script:
HOOK: AI now knows which agents will quit before their broker does. [ON-SCREEN: AI PREDICTS AGENT DEPARTURES]

BRAND INTRO: "This is D.J. Paris with Keeping It Real Podcast, and this is your agent tip of the day."

SETUP: Look, I've recruited over 2,000 agents in 15 years. I've tried every system, every CRM, every "game-changing" tool that promised to revolutionize recruiting. [ON-SCREEN: 2,000+ AGENTS RECRUITED] Most of the time, you're throwing darts in the darkâ€”cold calling agents who aren't even thinking about moving, while the ones ready to jump are talking to your competitors.
[15-SEC RE-HOOK]: But I just found something that completely flips the script on agent recruiting.

INSIGHT: It's called Corded, and here's what blew my mind: it scans dozens of data points for every agent in your marketâ€”production trends, social media activity, career patternsâ€”and flags exactly who's likely to move. [ON-SCREEN: SCANS DOZENS OF VARIABLES] But here's the crazy part: it reads YOUR brokerage website, learns what you actually offer, then tells you exactly what to say to each specific agent. [ON-SCREEN: CUSTOM SCRIPTS FOR EACH AGENT] As one recruiter told me: "Corded's AI tells me exactly what to say based on that agent's needs and what my brokerage can offer. It even writes the emails." This isn't just lead generationâ€”this is recruitment on full autopilot.

REFRAME: Think about this: while you're guessing who might be interested, your competitor has a list of agents ready to move with the exact words that'll close them. You can start using this today at corded.io.

CTA: "Are you still recruiting blind, or are you ready to let AI do the heavy lifting?"

CLOSE: "See you next time."

---

PERFORMANCE_NOTES: [1] Emphasize "before their broker does" in hook with slight pause. [2] Speed up during the data points list to build momentum. [3] Lean in slightly when delivering the quoteâ€”make it feel like insider intel.
